data.title: Record Stores all around the world
data.text:
Tribe Records

Address: 28 Kirkgate, Leeds LS2 7DR, UK

Specialist record shop supplying DJs, collectors and catering for all your vinyl needs. Stocking house, techno, electro, dub, reggae, funk, soul, disco, EDM, wave, classics, hip-hop, broken beat, music from all around the world from Brazil to Africa. A hub for local and visiting clubbers, dancers, DJs and aficionados. Open on some Sundays, but give us a call. Dance music, world music and reggae are our specialities.

G2K Records

Website: facebook.com

Address: 832 Park Ave NW, Norton, VA 24273, USA

G2K Records is a locally owned and operated record store in Norton, VA. The store carries new and used vinyl, as well as used CDs, cassettes, and more. The store is suite B of the address provided. Suite A is G2K Games, the video game store half of the building which is known overall as G2K. Customers can freely walk between either half once inside.

Redline Records

Website: Discogs

Address: Mantra House South Street, Keighley BD21 1SX, UK

Based in Keighley, West Yorkshire Redline Records offers an extensive selection of used dance music vinyl across all sub genres with thousands of 12" records in stock at any one time.By appointment only, viewings can be arranged 7 days a week. Appointments can be made via phone or social media links.In store facilities include Technics 1200 listening stations, WC and free drinks!We also buy your record collections and DJ equipment. Feel free to contact us for a free valuation.

Corner Palé

Address: Plutarco Elías Calles 430, Barrio Tampiquito, Tampiquito, 66240 San Pedro Garza García, N.L., Mexico

New Records from mexican and spanish labels and a bunch of selected second hand and collection records from every kind of music.

Sex Beat Records

Website: sexbeatrecords.dk

Address: Nørre Voldgade 6, 1358 København, Denmark

Welcome to Sex Beat Records. We stock a lot of alternative rock music. We import CD's from USA and England. Check in on Ltd CD's and a lot of great stuff which have not hit main audience yet. We sell concert ticket for all concerts and events which are on pre-sale with Billetnet and Billetmaskinen. SEX BEAT RECORDS NØRRE VOLDGADE 6 1358 Copenhagen K Tel: +45 40 12 88 92

Beat Bop

Address: Peder Hvitfeldts Stræde 14, 1173 København K, Denmark

Owned by Michael Denner (Mercyful Fate, Force Of Evil, King Diamond...). 2nd & new Stuff. Rock, Metal and other types of music. Rarities. Aside from playing lead guitar for legendary acts like Mercyful Fate, Michael Denner owns Beat Bop Records which has become a staple of music shopping in Copenhagen Denmark.

The Audio Room

Address: 61 Magellan St, Lismore NSW 2480, Australia

The Audio Room is Analogue Heaven!Analogue based hi fi shop, supplying anything and everything to do with playing records. Strictly 2 channel, no TV sets and no hard sell!
